page.title: 06PLAYGROUND GAMES (continued)
page.content: {"Doctor doctor".}One person turns away to face a fence. A team of 6 or 7 hold hands and make a circle. The people in the circle get in a muddle by putting their legs over their arms and their heads under their arms without letting go of their hands. They call "doctor doctor" and the doctor (the person facing the fence), has to untangle them.They must not let go of their hands while this is done.When they are untangled, someone else is the doctor. {"Red Rover".}Two teams face each other holding hands.One sings, "Red Rover Red Rover, will you send over Fred". Fred runs across and tries to break through their arms.If he does, he goes back to his team.If he doesn't he joins the other team.The other team sings and someone tries to break through their arms.The game ends when there is no-one left on one team.
